import React, { useState , useEffect, useCallback} from 'react'; import './Slideshow.css'; // Optional: Create a separate CSS file for styles // Slide Component const Slide = ({ character, line, bgColor = 'bg-black', textColor = 'text-white' }) => (

{character}

"{line}"

); // Slideshow Component const Slideshow2 = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const slides = [ { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Oh it’s you! What did you want me for?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "What are you up to? Why not come out here and mix with the others?" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "I’ve been having a chat with the Shrimp, your adopted daughter. She’s a sweet child." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "And now how about coming out here for a chat with us. Come and join us, don’t be so unkind." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "No, no, I’d rather talk with your adopted daughter." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "There’s just no way getting him to do anything." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Mr. Jin’s bought three million of the same bonds as you." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "So long as the information’s reliable that Mr. Jin is buying, then of course he’s expecting a rise." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "It must not be unreliable, it must be right." }, { "character": "GEORGY ZHANG", "line": "It’s hard to live in China, nowhere to live in comfort." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "The Shrimp! Zhujun, have you seen the Shrimp?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Why isn’t she in the room?" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "No, she’s gone. I saw her go down in the lift with two or three men." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Yueting, see what happens when I ask you to do something for me!" }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Bailu!" }, { "character": "GEORGY ZHANG", "line": "Look! Just another mad one!" }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Bah! Nothing but 'Hai-ei-hai'! By the time the building’s finished we’ll all be driven to madness." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Listen to this! Still at it! They keep singing and ramming all day and night!" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Hush! Listen to their singing. It’s cheerful, despite their labor." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Born to slave in poverty. Do you think they enjoy this work?" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Who’s been building this? Is it for the rich?" }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "It’s being built by Da Feng Bank, Mr. Pan, and probably Mrs. Gu too." }, { "character": "HUANG XINGSAN", "line": "But sir, I’m a clerk at Da Feng Bank. I’m Huang." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Do you know me or not?" }, { "character": "HUANG XINGSAN", "line": "I dare not say I do." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Then march out! Get out, and don’t return unless you want trouble!" }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "How about a little game of mahjong to ease your mind?" }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "Oh no! My heart is aching again. I must stop or my old trouble will return." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Is it your heart acting up again? I’ll get you some water." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "Yes, please. I need my medicine quickly!" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Mr. Jin from the bank just bought millions in government bonds." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Where’s Dasheng? I thought I saw him here earlier." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "You don’t mean that gentleman who gives me the creeps, do you?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Yes, he lives here. He’s my cousin." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "This place is truly depressing. Even the room feels dark." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Right! The sun never reaches here. It’s always gloomy." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Shiqing, will you let me go home now? This is no place for us." }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "I’ve lost almost all the money you gave me. I didn’t want to play." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "You’ve lost it all? Why get nervous playing mahjong?" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "You insisted I play with them. Now I’ve lost, and all you do is scold me!" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Stop crying! Here’s some more money. Don’t make a scene." }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "Where did you get this? Have you pawned your fur coat again?" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "That’s none of your business! You don’t need to know everything!" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "Oh, Shiqing, we’ve got so many children to care for. How can you keep doing this?" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Stop it! You think I don’t know? This poverty haunts me every day!" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "But what about our children? You’re so busy with your schemes, you forget them!" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I’m fighting to give them a better life! You don’t realize how much I hate this poverty!" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "But you shouldn’t ruin yourself by going around with these people!" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "What choice do I have? We play mahjong with them to survive in this society." }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "But our children have no money for schooling, no decent clothes. How can you go on?" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Just stop talking about it! Do you think I don’t feel tortured by this every day?" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "Shiqing, we don’t belong in this place. Why must you push yourself so hard?" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I have to! If I stop, we’ll never escape this miserable life!" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "Is it worth losing your dignity just to keep up appearances with these rich people?" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I hate bowing to them! But it’s the only way to give our children a future." }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "I understand, Shiqing, but there must be another way." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "No! There’s no other way. I’ve had to swallow my pride for too long." }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "Shiqing, don’t let this consume you. I know you’ve been suffering, but we can find another path." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I won’t stop until I’ve succeeded! I will have my revenge on this unfair world!" }, { "character": "MRS. LI", "line": "Revenge? But who are you fighting against?" }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Everyone who’s treated me like dirt for years. They’ll see what I’m capable of!" }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Shiqing! There you are. I’ve been looking for you." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I’ve been here for a while, but I didn’t want to disturb you." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Good. There’s something important I need to discuss with you." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Of course, sir. Shall we go into the other room?" }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Yes, let’s go. We’ve got to talk about the bonds situation." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I’ve got the latest updates on the bond market. Things are looking shaky." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "I’ve noticed. We must strategize to avoid any panic among the depositors." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "What about Mr. Jin? He seems to be a key player in this." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Yes, he is. We need to keep a close eye on his moves." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "I’ll gather more intel. We can’t afford any mistakes now." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Exactly. Remember, it’s not just our jobs at stake." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Understood. I’ll make sure to stay vigilant." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "Oh, there you are, Mr. Pan! I need to speak with you." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Of course, Mrs. Gu. What’s on your mind?" }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "It’s about my investments. I’m worried about the market." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "I understand your concerns, Mrs. Gu. The market has been quite volatile lately." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "What should I do? Should I pull out my investments?" }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Not just yet. I recommend we hold for now and see how it plays out." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "Hold? But what if it gets worse? I can’t afford to lose!" }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "I assure you, Mrs. Gu, we’ll navigate through this together." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Mrs. Gu, you can count on us. We’ll do everything to protect your assets." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "Thank you, gentlemen. I appreciate your support." }, { "character": "LI SHIQING", "line": "Just make sure to stay calm and informed. That’s crucial right now." }, { "character": "PAN YUETING", "line": "Exactly. Let’s keep our communication open." }, { "character": "MRS. GU", "line": "I’ll do my best to stay updated." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "What’s all this fuss about? Can’t a man have some peace?" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "They’re just trying to figure out their finances, Fusheng." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Finances? Ha! Money makes the world go round, but it also causes trouble." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "You’re right, Fusheng. Money can ruin relationships." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "But we need it to survive. There’s no way around it." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Survival? What a word! We’re all slaves to money!" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Perhaps, but it’s the reality we face." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Reality or not, we should strive for more than just survival." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "You dreamers think you can change the world." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Sometimes change starts with small steps." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "You can’t just accept things as they are, Fusheng." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "And what do you propose? A grand revolution?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "It doesn’t have to be grand. Even small actions matter." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Exactly! If we all do our part, change is possible." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Ha! You’re all naive. The world doesn’t work that way." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Maybe not, but hope is what keeps us moving forward." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Right! Hope and action together can lead to progress." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Dreamers are often the ones who suffer the most." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "But they also inspire others to dream." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Inspiration is a powerful force, Fusheng." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Inspiration? What good does it do when reality bites?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Sometimes it’s the only thing that can spark real change." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "We need to believe in something greater than ourselves." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Belief? It’s a luxury for the rich!" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "No, it belongs to everyone, regardless of their status." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "If we unite our beliefs, we can challenge the status quo." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "You really think that would work? People are too selfish!" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Change takes time, but it starts with dialogue." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "And it begins with understanding each other's struggles." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Fine, let’s talk. What do you want to understand?" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "We want to understand the reality you face daily, Fusheng." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Reality? It’s harsh! We struggle for every meal." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "We know times are tough, but there’s strength in unity." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Unity? What a nice thought, but it’s easier said than done!" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Nothing worthwhile is ever easy. We can make it work." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "And how do you plan to do that?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "By sharing our resources and supporting one another." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "We could start a community fund to help those in need." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "A fund? You think people will contribute?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "If they believe in the cause, they will." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "A cause? Everyone’s out for themselves. Who cares about community?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "It’s human nature to care! We just need to remind them." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "What if we hold a meeting? Share our experiences." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "A meeting? They’ll laugh at you. What do you know?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "We know enough! Everyone has a story worth sharing." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Right! Sometimes, listening is all it takes to inspire." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "You think a few stories will change anything?" }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Yes! Stories connect us. They show our shared struggles." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "It could spark ideas for solutions we haven’t considered." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "You really believe that? I don’t see it happening." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "What if we try? It’s better than doing nothing." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Let’s give it a shot. What’s the worst that could happen?" }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "More disappointment, I suppose. But fine, I’ll listen." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "That’s the spirit! Let’s set a date and spread the word." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "I’ll help with the logistics. We need a venue." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "And I’ll find people who might want to share their stories." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Let’s also think about how to make everyone feel comfortable sharing." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Good idea! We could provide refreshments to create a welcoming atmosphere." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Are we really doing this? You all sound so enthusiastic." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Enthusiasm is key! We need to believe in what we’re doing." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "If we can ignite even a small spark of hope, it’s worth it." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Hope is nice, but we also need concrete plans." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Right! After the meeting, we can brainstorm actionable steps." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "And we can assign roles based on people’s strengths." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Okay, but let’s be realistic. Not everyone will join in." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "That’s true, but even a few dedicated individuals can make a difference." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "And those few can inspire others over time." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Alright, I’m willing to help. Count me in." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Great! Let’s put together a flyer to advertise the meeting." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "I can design it. I’ve got some experience with graphics." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Perfect! We’ll need to emphasize that everyone’s welcome." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "And that it’s a safe space for open dialogue." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Once we finalize the details, we can distribute the flyers." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "I’ll take charge of posting them around the neighborhood." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Let’s also spread the word through social media." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Good thinking! I can create an event on social platforms." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Alright, I’m starting to see the potential here." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Together, we can make this happen!" }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "It’s exciting to think about the possibilities." }, { "character": "WANG FUSHENG", "line": "Just remember, we have to keep expectations realistic." }, { "character": "CHEN BAILU", "line": "Of course! It’s about progress, not perfection." }, { "character": "FANG DASHENG", "line": "Let’s do our best and see where it leads." }, ]; const nextSlide = useCallback(() => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide + 1) % slides.length); }, [slides.length]); // Function to go to the previous slide const prevSlide = useCallback(() => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length); }, [slides.length]); useEffect(() => { const handleKeyDown = (event) => { if (event.key === 'ArrowRight') { nextSlide(); // Right arrow key pressed } else if (event.key === 'ArrowLeft') { prevSlide(); // Left arrow key pressed } }; window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown); // Add event listener for keydown return () => { window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown); // Clean up event listener on unmount }; }, [nextSlide, prevSlide]); return (
{currentSlide + 1} / {slides.length}
); }; export default Slideshow2;
